summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of DISCÍPULOS hip-hop band website. All specified features working correctly including navigation, visual design, animations, and MySpace 2000s aesthetic.
passed_tests: Home page loads with band logo (white background, cyan border)
Marquee text scrolls with cyan/yellow gradient colors
DISCÍPULOS title in cyan with glow effect
Animated icons (fire, stars, sparkle) present and animating
Navigation works between all pages (Home, Sobre, Discografia, Membros)
Merch button opens external link to www.dscpls.shop
All social media links present and correct
Members page shows 6 members with alternating cyan/yellow colors
About page shows stats (6 MEMBROS, 5 ESTADOS, ∞ VISÃO)
Consistent cyan/yellow visual theme throughout site
Spotify embeds show expected 'Application error' (normal in test environment)
